#summary Shows how to use GParallelizer for Gradle-based projects.

= Introduction =

GParallelizer is stored in the java.net maven repository at http://download.java.net/maven/2/. To include GParallelizer in your project add the following repository and dependency into your project: 

{{{
repositories {
    mavenRepo urls: ["http://download.java.net/maven/2/"]
}

dependencies {
    compile "org.gparallelizer:GParallelizer:0.8.3"
}

}}}

You may also consider checking the [MavenIntegration Maven integration page] for more details.
